quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Identify the correct indirect speech: He said, 'I will go to the market.'
options: He said that he will go to the market.
He said that he would go to the market.
He said he go to the market.
He says he go to the market.
quiz.answer: He said that he would go to the market.
